To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Momentum _mom;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_mom = MOM(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_mom.IsReady)
{
    var current = _mom.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.mom = self.MOM(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.mom.IsReady:
    current = self.mom.Current.Value
